entries.title: Do you have a moral duty to watch the police beating of Tyre Nichols?
entries.description: If you choose, apps give you control to restrict graphic images.

entries.title: ‘Fallout 4’ has aged beautifully. You should play it again.
entries.description: “Fallout 4” might be one of the best open-world role-playing games ever made. It is time to give it its flowers.

entries.title: Video shows mysterious whirlpool spiral flying over Hawaii night sky
entries.description: Enthusiasts speculated that the formation, which was caught on a telescope, was linked to a SpaceX satellite launch that took place the same day.

entries.title: CEO apologizes for using Martin Luther King Jr. quote in layoffs email
entries.description: Jennifer Tejada, the CEO of PagerDuty, received backlash after referencing a quote from a Martin Luther King Jr. sermon while announcing layoffs.
